long_description: Give a lift to your fully-loaded lumbar pack. Attach the over-the-shoulder Mountainsmith Strapettes to carry your waist pack like a backpack. Compatible with the Day, Tour, Tour FX, Ether 20 and Travel Trunk. Detachable, adjustable shoulder strap system helps keep heavier loads in your lumbar pack secure against your back for comfortable, ergonomic carrying. Adds extra support for carrying 5 - 15 lbs. more weight in the Day, Tour and Tour FX lumbar packs, and up to 65 lbs. more weight in the Travel Trunk. Stainless steel ring for lower attachment; side release buckle for upper attachment. The Mountainsmith Strapettes measure 17.25 x 2.25 x 0.5 in.; they are padded for comfort with 0.25 in. EVA foam and extend to a maximum length of 44 in.
short_description: Give a lift to your fully-loaded lumbar pack. Attach the over-the-shoulder Mountainsmith Strapettes to carry your waist pack like a backpack.
